Text: (The MNA receives a wide range of intel.)
(This includes business trends within the capital.)

(There is also plenty of new intel circulating below
the surface regarding the new commercial facility
being built by Luna, Ltd.)

(It's not just gossip and baseless rumors but also
measured analyses that accurately predict our
business strategy.)
(This includes business trends within the capital.)

(We can't control the city's network of intel since
maintaining proper exposure is key to our integrity
and credibility as a company.)

(...As those who lurk in the shadows, we will secretly
exploit this intel without compromising its flow.)

(This means I can also intercept the movements of
rival companies in relation to Luna, Ltd.!)

(...It's nearly time for A-Okay Co. to begin their
meeting at the trading firm across the street from
here.)

(Are they innocently curious about Luna, Ltd.? Or are
they guilty in plotting to take us down?)

Guess I'll kick back and enjoy my afternoon tea while
I wait to see how things pan out.

Now then, give us the progress report on
Luna, Ltd.
...The assassination attempt on Luna failed.

Only the wolves returned, and the mercenaries we
hired were all slain by what appears to be a long
sword.
What...?!

We also found the corpses of bandits, but these were
inflicted with injuries from the mercenaries' weapons
and the wolves' fangs, so we can assume this was the
result of an accidental encounter.

Based on this, we surmise that Luna, Ltd. has hired a
skilled fighter as a bodyguard.

Furthermore, Luna is now accompanied by several
guards at all times, making it literally impossible
to catch her off guard.

Unbelievable! You mean we've missed our opportunity
to kill the woman?

No need to despair. This just means the quick and
simple route is no longer an option.

In any case, there are ways to rid ourselves of a
merchant requiring neither blade nor magic.

No matter what form of commercial facility they build,
they cannot conduct business if their products never
arrive there.
I see! So we'll suppress the flow of goods!

They have less than two months until the completion
of their store. That should give us plenty of time to
prepare!

We must act in a way that can't be traced back to us
to avoid bad blood between the suppliers and us...

It will be a massive blow to our businesses if they
succeed in getting their business off the ground in
that prime location.

We must do everything we can to stop them. Despite
any temporary losses, we have much to gain in the
future.
Heh... They're guilty as hell.

Lady Alpha! We've received preliminary reports from
Beta and Zeta.

There's little doubt it's A-Okay Co. that is plotting
against Luna, Ltd.

At this time, they appear to have no connection with
the Cult of Diablos and are solely attempting to
interfere with our business.

A-Okay Co.? If I recall correctly, they're a mid-
sized trade association with businesses based in
the capital's center.

Indeed. They are located close to the site of
Luna, Ltd.'s new proposed facility and are
potential competitors for fashion aimed at
the aristocrats.
What do you mean by "potential"?

A-Okay Co. is a trade association of companies
specializing in evening gowns for aristocrats and
perfumed oils and ointments for the Church.

We're not in direct competition with them for the
time being, as Luna, Ltd. specializes in menswear
products. However, we believe they may be taking
measures now in anticipation of the future.

So they've decided to hit the hornet's nest in their
neighbor's yard. Guess we ought to expect this sort
of thing so long as we're doing business publicly.

...Let's hold a strategy meeting. Epsilon, please
gather the other Seven Shadows.
Understood!
